##### Richness - Productivity

```{r}
for (time_point_input in 1:7) {
  p = ds_patches %>%
    filter(patch_type %in% patch_type_input,
           time_point == time_point_input) %>%
    ggplot(
      aes(
        x = species_richness,
        y = bioarea_µm2_per_ml,
        #group = interaction(species_richness, patch_type),
        color = patch_type
      )
    ) +
    geom_point() +
    labs(title = time_point_input)
  
  print(time_point_input)
  
  print(p)
  
}
```

##### Shannon - Productivity

```{r}
ds_patches %>%
    filter(patch_type %in% patch_type_input,
           species_richness < 11) %>%
    ggplot(
      aes(
        x = shannon,
        y = bioarea_µm2_per_ml,
        #group = interaction(species_richness, patch_type),
        color = patch_type
      )
    ) +
    geom_point()
```
